purpose: To enable users to create and interact with 3D AI agents using motion capture and model technology
principle: Leverages 3D motion capture and MMD models to render and animate AI agents in a virtual environment
reusability: Provides a platform for integrating 3D models and animations, supports custom agent creation and interaction
limitations: Requires specific hardware for motion capture, limited to environments that support 3D rendering
name: Bynce
description: First 3D AI Agent Platform, allowing users to recreate and display Bynce Agent. Using 3D Motion Capture & MMD Model Technology to interact with Bynce.
highlight: First 3D AI Agent Platform utilizing 3D Motion Capture and MMD Model Technology
